programme.title: Bloodfist III: Forced to Fight
programme.desc: An innocent half-Asian kickboxer (Don "The Dragon" Wilson) is caught between two other races at war in prison.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A fast talker (Eric Tsang) engages a Hong Kong rube (Jet Li) to track down the assassin of a sleazy Japanese businessman.

programme.title: The Crush
programme.desc: A writer (Cary Elwes) moves into a wealthy family's guest house and befriends a precocious 14-year-old daughter (Alicia Silverstone).

programme.title: Bloodfist VI: Ground Zero
programme.desc: A kickboxer (Don "The Dragon" Wilson) must prevent the launch of a nuclear missile by terrorists targeting New York.

programme.title: Living in Oblivion
programme.desc: A harried director must contend with technical foul-ups and actors' shenanigans on the set of a low-budget film.

programme.title: The Exorcist III
programme.desc: A police detective (George C. Scott) investigates a series of slayings done in the style of an executed killer (Brad Dourif).

programme.title: Judgment Night
programme.desc: On their way to a boxing match, four young men take a wrong turn in Chicago and find danger as witnesses to murder.

programme.title: FernGully ... the Last Rainforest
programme.desc: A lumberjack helps a tribe of rain-forest elves protect their kingdom from an evil spirit and greedy clear-cutters.

programme.title: FernGully 2: The Magical Rescue
programme.desc: Two FernGully faeries leave the rain forest to save three baby animals from poachers.

programme.title: Homegrown
programme.desc: A go-between (Kelly Lynch) helps California marijuana growers (Billy Bob Thornton, Hank Azaria) take action when their boss is killed.

programme.title: The Getaway
programme.desc: An explosives-expert thief (Alec Baldwin) and his wife (Kim Basinger) cross a crime lord and are chased to the Mexican border.

programme.title: Legionnaire
programme.desc: A 1920s playboy (Jean-Claude Van Damme) returns from a stint in the French Foreign Legion to reclaim his lover, a mobster's mistress.

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross
programme.desc: Underhanded real estate salesmen sink to varying levels of deceit in order to sell their dubious properties.

programme.title: The Road to Wellville
programme.desc: Dr. John Kellogg (Anthony Hopkins) treats a young couple (Bridget Fonda, Matthew Broderick) for their imagined ailments at his Michigan sanitorium circa 1907.
